    • Method Detail

      • dismissAlarmActivity

        public static void dismissAlarmActivity(android.content.Context context,
                                        NacAlarm alarm)
        Dismiss the alarm activity for the given alarm. If alarm is null, it will stop the currently active alarm activity.

      • dismissForegroundService

        public static void dismissForegroundService(android.content.Context context,
                                            NacAlarm alarm)
        Dismiss the foreground service for the given alarm. If alarm is null, it will stop the currently active foreground service.

      • dismissForegroundServiceFromNfcScan

        public static boolean dismissForegroundServiceFromNfcScan(android.content.Context context,
                                                          android.content.Intent intent,
                                                          NacAlarm alarm)
        Dismiss the foreground service for the given alarm due to an NFC tag being scanned.
        Returns:
        True if decided to dismiss the foreground service, and False if unable to due to null values or NFC tag IDs not matching.

      • snoozeForegroundService

        public static void snoozeForegroundService(android.content.Context context,
                                           NacAlarm alarm)
        Snooze the foreground service for the given alarm. The alarm cannot be null, unlike the dismissForegroundService() method.

      • stopAlarmActivity

        public static void stopAlarmActivity(android.content.Context context,
                                     NacAlarm alarm)
        Stop the alarm activity for the given alarm. If alarm is null, it will stop the currently active alarm activity.
